lead_paragraph: Questions are raised about a script that Queens prosecutors, seeking interviews, read to suspects before they are arraigned.
snippet: Questions are raised about a script that Queens prosecutors, seeking interviews, read to suspects before they are arraigned.

headline.main: Suit Seeks to Silence Queens Judge on Interview Tactic
headline.seo: Queens D.A. Sues to Silence Judge on Interview Tactic
headline.print_headline: Suit Seeks to Silence Queens Judge on Interview Tactic
